wrot=
e:
> One problem I noticed though is when using the MirrorWriterProcessor
>=
 with URLs that have ":" in them. Such files cannot be created on
> windows=
 - is there some workaround for that?

The character-map setting can be use=
d to map ':' to some other
character.  The help for it has a recommendation=
 for Windows.
Note also the case-sensitive, dot-end, and underscore-set
set=
tings.
